title: Reports
lede: Generate detailed reports on call performance, agent productivity, and business metrics.

sections.title: Report Types
sections.content:
Generate comprehensive reports for different aspects of your business.

Available Reports:

  • Call Performance: Detailed call statistics and outcomes
  • Agent Productivity: Individual agent performance metrics
  • Campaign Analysis: Campaign success rates and ROI
  • Cost Reports: Detailed spending breakdowns

sections.title: Report Features
sections.content:
Customize and schedule reports to meet your business needs.

  • Custom Date Ranges: Specify exact time periods
  • Multiple Formats: PDF, Excel, CSV export options
  • Scheduled Reports: Automatic delivery to email
  • Data Filtering: Focus on specific metrics or segments

metaTitle: Reports - Generate Custom Analytics | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Generate detailed reports on agent performance, call outcomes, and business metrics. Export and schedule reports.
metaKeywords: reports, custom analytics, report generation, data export, scheduled reports, business reporting
